subject: English
title: Chapter 27 Something Special
content:
--- Page 1 ---
1. Listen, read and do it yourself. 6
Cel, ara safer qeetet aa.

Something Special

What does every classroom have ?

A board, a table, a chair, one or two cupboards,
desks and benches or mats, charts, posters,
calendars and so on.

We have something special in our classroom.

It is a postbox, just for us.
We write messages,

cards and letters

to our friends in the class.
Then we put them

in the postbox.
Every day, our teacher

opens the postbox.

Wish you
all the best!

She looks at the names
on the letters and cards
and hands them out.

We are planning a surprise for our Teacher.

She will get it on the fifth of September,

Teachers’ Day!
